email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Emily Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN STAR for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 250m. Our starting freight quote is USD 75/MT. The laycan is 25-30 September. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high. Could you consider USD 70/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Emily Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

We can adjust the rate to USD 72/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the revised quote. We agree to the rate of USD 72/MT and the demurrage rate of USD 15,000 per day. Please proceed with the booking and send us the recap.

Best regards,
Emily Wilson

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Steel Coils
- Cargo Size: 12,000MT
- Load Port: Rotterdam
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: USD 72/MT CIF
- Laycan: 25-30 September
- Demurrage: USD 15,000/day

Let us know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
John Smith
